>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/call/reject"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Rechaza una llamada entrante activa (si la instancia está en llamada).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"remoteJid":{"type":"string","description":"JID del contacto que llama","example":"51987654321@s.whatsapp.net"},"callId":{"type":"string","description":"ID de la llamada (si aplica)"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Llamada rechazada exitosamente","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"success":{"type":"boolean","example":true},"message":{"type":"string","example":"Llamada rechazada"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
